Reference

Assess

Sequentially execute the Assessment Pipeline Functions (Transform, Analyze, Flag, and Summarize)

AE_Assess()

Adverse Event Assessment

Consent_Assess()

Consent Assessment

Disp_Assess()

Disposition Assessment

IE_Assess()

Inclusion/Exclusion Assessment

LB_Assess()

Labs Assessment

PD_Assess()

Protocol Deviation Assessment

Study_Assess()

Run Multiple Assessments on a Study

Visualize

Generate a visualization from the Assessment results

Visualize_Count()

Group-level visualization of group-level Inclusion/Exclusion results

Visualize_Scatter()

Group-level visualization of group-level results using a Poisson or Wilcoxon model.

Visualize_Score()

Group-level visualization of scores.

Visualize_Workflow()

Flowchart visualization of data pipeline steps from filtering to summary data for an assessment workflow.

Analyze_Poisson_PredictBounds()

Poisson Analysis - Predicted Boundaries

Map

Generate input data from multiple clinical data standards (generally Raw+ or SDTM-)

AE_Map_Adam()

Adverse Event Assessment - ADaM Mapping

AE_Map_Raw()

Adverse Event Assessment - Raw Mapping

Consent_Map_Raw()

Consent Assessment - Raw Mapping

Disp_Map_Raw()

Disposition Assessment - Raw Mapping

IE_Map_Raw()

Inclusion/Exclusion Assessment - Raw Mapping

LB_Map_Raw()

Lab Assessment - Raw Mapping

PD_Map_Raw()

Protocol Deviation Assessment - Raw Mapping

Analyze

Conduct statistical analysis based on input data

Analyze_Chisq()

Chi-squared Test Analysis

Analyze_Identity()

Analyze Identity

Analyze_Fisher()

Fisher's Exact Test Analysis

Analyze_Poisson()

Poisson Analysis - Site Residuals

Analyze_Wilcoxon()

AE Wilcoxon Assessment - Analysis

Data Pipeline

Create site-level summary, analyzed, and flagged data for an assessment

Transform_EventCount()

Transform Event Count

Flag()

Flag

Summarize()

Make Summary Data Frame

Reporting

Creates summary tables and HTML objects to create a report

Study_AssessmentReport()

Make Summary of 1 or more assessment Data checks

Study_Report()

Study Report

Study_Table()

Make Assessment overview table

rank_chg()

Report Helper Functions

Utility

Utility functions for use within the Data Pipeline

is_mapping_valid()

Check that a data frame contains columns and fields specified in mapping

MergeSubjects()

Merge Domain data with subject-level data

MakeAssessmentList()

Load assessments from a package/directory

ConsolidateStrata()

Consolidate stratified assessment outputs

MakeStratifiedAssessment()

Create multiple workflows from a single stratified workflow

RunStratifiedWorkflow()

Run a stratified workflow

RunAssessment()

Run a single assessment

FilterData()

Subset a data frame

FilterDomain()

Subset a data frame given a mapping

RunStep()

Run a single step in a workflow

CheckInputs()

Check mapping inputs

parse_data_mapping()

Parse Data Mapping

parse_data_spec()

Parse Data Specification

generate_md_table()

Generate Markdown Table

MapMaker()

Read YAML mapping in Assess functions without params
